item.title: About
item.description: Nice to meet you! ðŸ‘‹ I am a computer scientist, software engineer, and full stack developer aiming to solve problems with out of the box thinking. In otherwords I make computers go beep-bop ðŸ¤– to solve problems in our lives._ I like to manipulate things till they break, or just to re-make them in a data oriented manner for a better experience. Meaning I like to break, manipulate, optimize software. I might leverage parallel computing, data science, algorithms, or artificial intelligence to create a better and lighter solution.

item.title: About
item.description: Breaking Stuff unsupress A chrome extension for one specific e-commerce website to make it a bit less sleazy. It pulls back the curtain on how many “refurbished like new 10/10 iPhones NOT FOR USA LOCKED” that the seller actually has listed on the platform. dreamtA A dreamy transit client for NYC Subways. It’s outrageously lightweight and powerful *when the MTA isn’t lying about where the trains are. hosted on Glitch

item.title: Contact Info
item.description: This page relies on JavaScript to work properly! Does not compute. Does not compute. My buffer is overflowing. My hard drive is scrambling. My fan is overheating. But really, JavaScript must be enabled for this page to fully load. Without it this page can not determine your user status. See My GitHub See My Linked In

item.title: Live Resume
item.description: Jim Jiang Computer Scientist Software Engineer Full Stack Developer Problem Solver Education September 2015 - May 2019 at New York University Bachelors in Computer Science Minors in Chemistry and Web Development and Applications Completed Coursework in Full Stack Web Development, Algorithms, Operating Systems, Computers Systems Organization, Computer Networks, Open Source Software, and Object Oriented Programming. Languages and Skills Excellent AJAX
